recipesJson.name: TheHimCatself
recipesJson.author: matthewkocanda
recipesJson.description: bullshit attempt at Jack's pineapple vape

reviews.text: Nice fruity recipe with a light cream at the end to make it smooth. I have Fuji ordered, I subbed it for CAP double apple for now and it still works. IMHO due to VBIC it's not a shake and vape, but let it steep for 5-7 days to let everything settle. Can't wait to get the fuji in.
I don't know Jack, but this is delicious.
This is an excellent pineapple smoothie wish Jack would come back to us so we can get his version
